title: Edryd ac Wmffra
content: Mae Edryd a'i ffrind Wmffra'r eliffant eisiau gweld os ydi dillad ysgol Edryd yn gweithio. Edryd and his friend Wmffra the elephant put Edryd's school clothes to the test.
